kw.name: Run Process
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Get Process Result
kw.doc: Returns the specified `result object` or some of its attributes.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Start Process
kw.doc: Starts a new process on background.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Close All Applications
kw.doc: Closes all open applications.

kw.name: Terminate All Processes
kw.doc: Terminates all still running processes started by this library.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
